Blue Predictive Hiring Dashboard

HR · Predictive Hiring · Recruitment

Design and development of a dashboard for the creation and management of HR companies and their campaigns.

The Client

Blue Intelligence GmbH

Hedwigstrasse 3

8032 Zürich

Schweiz

The Project

Blue software is addressed to recruiters and HR consultants and uses artificial intelligence to predict when qualified talents will look for a job before they do, through analyzing their social media behavior.

I designed the User Interface (UI), initially through Figma, and then implemented it through React.js and MUI.

I also implemented a REST API with Node.js, Express and Redis in order to access/store/handle resources and data from remote hosts.

View Website

What I Delivered

  • Responsive UI
  • REST API
  • Application Database

My Services

  • UX and UI Design
  • Solution Architecture
  • Application Development
